Terms of Service

By using JobHunter, you agree to the following terms.

1. Acceptance of Terms

By installing the JobHunter Chrome extension or using the JobHunter web dashboard, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use the service.

2. Description of Service

JobHunter is a free, open-source tool that helps automate job application form filling using AI-generated answers and profile data shortcuts. The service includes a Chrome browser extension and a web dashboard.

3. User Responsibilities

  • Accuracy: You are responsible for the accuracy of information in your profile and the answers submitted in job applications. Always review AI-generated content before submitting.
  • API Keys: You are responsible for securing your AI provider API keys and any costs incurred from their usage.
  • Compliance: You agree to use JobHunter in compliance with the terms of service of the job platforms you apply on.
  • Account Security: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account credentials.

4. AI-Generated Content

Answers generated by JobHunter's AI feature are suggestions only. They should be reviewed, edited, and personalized before submission. We make no guarantees about the accuracy, quality, or suitability of AI-generated content. You are solely responsible for any content you submit in job applications.

5. Free Service

JobHunter is provided free of charge. We do not guarantee uptime, availability, or uninterrupted service. The service may be modified, suspended, or discontinued at any time.

6. Intellectual Property

JobHunter is open-source software. The source code is available under its respective license on GitHub. You may use, modify, and distribute the software in accordance with the license terms.

7. Limitation of Liability

JobHunter is provided "as is" without warranty of any kind. To the fullest extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use of this service, including but not limited to:

  • Inaccurate or inappropriate AI-generated answers
  • Failed or missed job applications
  • API costs from third-party AI providers
  • Data loss or security breaches
  • Service interruptions or downtime

8. Third-Party Services

JobHunter integrates with third-party AI providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, OpenRouter) and operates on third-party job platforms. We are not responsible for the policies, practices, or availability of these third-party services.

9. Modifications

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of JobHunter after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

10. Termination

You may stop using JobHunter at any time by uninstalling the extension and deleting your account. We reserve the right to terminate accounts that violate these terms.

11. Contact

For questions about these terms, please open an issue on our GitHub repository.

JobHunter

AI-powered Chrome extension that fills job applications with smart, personalized answers. Free & open source.
